data.caption:
Had fun on this one!
Glad this will be my last hard run before the race!
Next time I'm this tired will be at the Boston finish line with Dad. üèÅ

Living with ALS has been challenging for Dad as the disease slowly progresses.
We are super excited to do this marathon together and make some great memories still.
Dad taught us to run from a young age, and we won't ever let him get out of the sport! üòÑ

HUGE thanks to everyone who has donated to make this possible for us!

Keep following along with us on here and at jeffreybirkel.org

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Solo long runs can get lonely, and I'm thankful to have a buddy today. Sasha has been my support for many long runs in preparation for both the BQ and now Boston itself.

For the Boston Marathon in 8 days, it'll be Mike, Dad, and I supporting each other. We're excited and grateful to have this opportunity to run as a family at this prestigious race. ALS is not stopping us!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Getting up there in miles now!
Timing worked out so we got to see a beautiful sunset across the lake just as we were finishing up. 
Only a few more longer runs before it's race day!
Can't wait to see that finish like at Boston!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

We're excited to share a special video we made to tell the story of our family journey! https://youtu.be/dSs4aWllVys

Many of you know, Jeff Birkel was diagnosed with ALS in December 2023.  Jeff was a distance runner for many years, and he inspired his sons, Matt and Mike, to run when they were kids.

As a gift and special experience, Matt and Mike decided to try and run the Boston Marathon with Jeff -- one of them pushing him in a pushchair, and the other running as an individual alongside.  They surprised him with this idea on Father's Day 2024!

We've officially qualified for Boston, and we're running to raise awareness and funds for ALS research.  We hope our story brings a smile and hope to anyone facing a tough diagnosis!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

The marathon is a long enough race that your body can get depleted of sugar & electrolytes. To mitigate this, runners will actually eat during the race, usually energy gels.

It's important to practice this fueling on our weekly long runs so that we're ready to do it during the race itself. Plus, we can test out different flavors and find our favorite for race day! Strawberry banana is one of my top picks.

20 miles done today, and soon Mike and I will be toeing the line to push our dad with ALS at Boston... with at least 4 energy gels in our pockets to get us through the race.

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Preparing for Boston's legendary Heartbreak Hill by running up the biggest hill in Sun Prairie! And during a long run, too, so that I simulate how it feels during the actual race üí™

It might not be quite the same as pushing Dad up Heartbreak Hill, but every little bit of prep counts!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Last long run in the dark! I'm an evening runner, so until Daylight Savings takes effect, it's hard for me to finish a long run before dusk. At least Ive got the gear for it, though!

Fortunately, the Boston Marathon will be run totally in the daytime, so I won't have to worry about wearing my headlamp and light vest for the race. But for now, we gotta make do! Next week is the start of Daylight Savings, woohoo!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Getting closer each run to race day!
For those who are wondering, the donuts actually worked pretty well. Would definitely recommend in a pinch üç©
Is this me teaching myself how to fuel for when I get into Ultras? Hope not! Marathons are far enough.

Starting to get a bit nervous for those hills at Boston, but it'll be worth it to run together as a family. 
Thanks @ajdiverde for the company on this run!

Keep following along with our journey and help us raise money for ALS at jeffreybirkel.org.

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

I would tell my boys when they didn't feel like or want to do a workout to just do it anyway. You'll be glad you did afterward. I dubbed those runs as "Character Building." I'm drawing on that character now to sustain me on my walk with ALS. I'm glad I got myself "up and out there" all those years! It's funny how things you did for other reasons can help you in ways you never dreamed of. Keep on keeping on!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

This run marks the half way point for the training block. Temps are coming back up and the snow is melting.

At the time of this post, there's just 1 month until the big day! My brother, Mike, and I will be pushing our dad, Jeff, at the Boston Marathon. Dad was diagnosed with ALS in Dec 2023. You can support our effort to raise funds for ALS research at jeffreybirkel.org

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Preparing to run marathon distances by hydrating and fueling is an important part of training. No surprises on race day!

I'm teaching my body to store up large amounts of fluids, electrolytes, & carbohydrates, which is going to give me the endurance I need to help push Dad to the Boston Marathon finish line next month!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Look who was live on WCCO & CBS News Minnesota  for yesterday's morning news!

Thanks to the The ALS Association  for connecting us with news stations and helping us tell our story.

You can watch this news interview and more on our YouTube channel.
 - This interview: https://youtu.be/xaXmP_DY0dE
 - Our channel: https://youtube.com/@jfbfound

Trying to do my part training for Boston and to maintain my mobility as much as possible. A little exercise is better than none, and I told Mike I'd try to lose my excess fat so as to help him on Heartbreak Hill!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

The trail's lonely today, but we're still getting our miles in. Dad would call runs like this "character-building runs."

New shoes feel great! Thanks to everyone for your support of Mike and I pushing our dad with ALS at the Boston Marathon.

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

I broke my PR! üôÉ I'm honestly impressed at how well both the shoes and my body held up.

Now, time to get some new shoes. Running in good shoes is especially important as I'm ramping up my weekly mileage training to push Dad with ALS at the Boston Marathon.

Support us by donating at jeffreybirkel.org

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

I'm working to maintain my mobility in order to make it easier for all of us on race day and getting around Boston. Plus, it's good to feel I can still train, albeit on a much lessor scale than my boys! It does make me feel better, too.

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Keep the long runs rolling! Each day we're getting stronger and more ready to push Dad across that finish line in Boston.

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Another long run done! Over a half marathon now.
I was a bit nervous at the start, but it didn't end up being too bad.
Best part about these runs is eating a ton afterwards.

Keep following to see us cross the finish line in April!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Team Birkel is building for Boston! Feeling very smooth on this 14-miler. The mileage fatigue hasn't kicked in yet üôÉ

Mike & I are training to push Dad with ALS at the Boston Marathon! Support us at jeffreybirkel.org

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Got to run outside finally! Beautiful day on the trail around Medicine Lake. Was pretty cold but definitely more fun than the treadmill.
Thanks @ajdiverde for the company!

Still looking forward to getting Dad to the finish at Boston!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Chugging along on our training for the Boston Marathon. Almost a half marathon this time!

Not the most fun on the basement treadmill but gotta grind these out until the weather gets better. Can't wait to get back outside!

Hope everyone out there is staying warm and enjoying winter

We are still a bit behind on our videos so bear with us as we continue to catch up!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Running in the cold can be tough, but that's not gonna stop us. We're putting one foot in front of the other for Dad and for ALS research!

Support us as we push Dad at the Boston Marathon to raise awareness & funds for ALS! jeffreybirkel.org

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Family beach vacation before Boston Marathon training really ramps up! Even though we're on vacation, we're still getting our runs in. Although we didn't have Dad's racing pushchair with us, he's still with us in spirit on our runs, and he even came down to cheer us on today! Enjoying the warm weather before we go back to the cold Midwest.

We'll be pushing Dad at the Boston Marathon and raising awareness and money for ALS. You can support us at jeffreybirkel.org!

#als #alsassociation #alsunited #beatals #bostonmarathon #bostonmarathon2025 #duoteam #duoteamracing #running #marathontraining

Been a bit since we kicked off our story on the Birkels pushing Dad in the Boston Marathon to raise awareness for ALS. Figured we would share a bit of how our training is going! 

First long run done and feeling good. Did 10 miles on the treadmill since it was cold and dark here in Minneapolis. Feeling pretty strong but it's still early in training. 

Doing this for Dad makes these long runs a lot easier! Can't wait to celebrate at the finish!

#als #alsassociation #family #running #beatals #bostonmarathon

For those of you who don't know us, we are the Birkels! We have been an active family our whole lives by running marathons, skiing the Rockies, and building robots just to name a few activities.

Unfortunately in December of 2023, our Dad, Jeff, was diagnosed with ALS, a progressive neurodegenerative disease that has no cure. It has been very difficult for the family to navigate this with Dad's slow loss of movement, but we won't let anything stop us!

Dad's two sons, Matt and Mike, came together on Father's Day 2024 to give him the gift of running the Boston Marathon together. Since Dad can no longer run, we had the goal of competing in the Duo Team division with a pushchair. 

It's been an adventure to get qualified since then, but we were officially accepted through the ALS Association! We fished the State Fair Marathon in Grand Island, NE this past August with Matt running 2:44 (3rd overall!) and Mike pushing Dad to 3:45. 

Follow along with our story as we train for Boston and continue making amazing memories with Dad.

More information and donations at jeffreybirkel.org

#alsassociation #defeatals #bostonmarathon #family #running
